question: How many Indian participants attends 46th Edition of "Know India Programme"?
explanation: 40 students from nine countries met Railways Minister Piyush Goyal as part of Know India Programme (KIP). KIP is Indian Government 's initiative to engage with the Indian diaspora in the age group of 18 to 30 years. It is a 25-day orientation programme, organised by Union Ministry of External Affairs in partnership with one or two Indian states. Participants for KIP are selected on the basis of nominations received and recommendations of Indian ambassadors in foreign countries. For 46th KIP, Madhya Pradesh was the partner state. Thus the participants visited Madhya Pradesh and also visited Parliament House and President's House in New Delhi.
